name: Deemo:
text: Thank you for helping me Zed!

name: Zed:
text: No worries. I can kill 2 birds in 1 stone if I help you.

name: Deemo:
text: Right. My spaceship uses garbage as a fuel in order to work. The trash can either be biodegradable or non-biodegradable.

name: Deemo:
text: Yes, it's a unique system. Biodegradable and non-biodegradable trash is converted into energy directly.

name: Zed:
text: Your world is very futuristic. Same for this garbage harpoon gun that lent to me.

name: Deemo:
text: Yeah. This gun of mine will help you to collect trash easily like a magnet attracting metals.

name: Zed:
text: That's awesome! I bet it makes the job a lot faster!

name: Deemo:
text: Definitely. Without it, collecting trash in space would be much more challenging.

name: Zed:
text: I don’t even know if earth is heaven or hell for having many trash that created by we humans.

name: Zed:
text: Well it is very fortunate for us that you are here collecting our waste specially in the sea. Collecting trash in the sea is very troublesome.

name: Deemo:
text: Yes, but I cannot use the fuel if my spaceship is broken.

name: Zed:
text: I saw that the spaceship has missing parts.

name: Deemo:
text: My spaceship missing 3 of its parts, but I don’t have any idea where the parts went.

name: Zed:
text: Well we cannot find anything if we keep in idle here. Maybe some clues will appear as we collect trash along the way.
